A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: There was no applause in the theater after we watched it\, if that tells you what random other people thought of it on opening night. There are so many problems with the story I don't want to spend time listing them all here... Pretty much breaks a flow of momentum between 7-8-9. They tried to make the movie too 'modern' with all the feel-good stuff going on these days.. Much more just don't have time to write the rest.
